name: The Sinking Theather
description:
NARRATIVE CONTEXT

The Kabuki theater is the physical representation of an internal conflict that occurs in the character's mind, in which he himself dispels worries (personified by Yokai) with his passion: drawing. 

He will try to prevent enemies from entering his comfort zone, represented by the grid. But over time, the more problems are avoided the more they become and increase in intensity, until the character will be completely overwhelmed.

FEATURES

DRAW SIGNS TO DEFEAT THE YOKAI

To defeat the enemies you will have to trace the correct symbols through your movements. There are six symbols that change with each wave, get ready and test your reflexes. 

Defeat the enemies without getting hit to charge your secret technique and overwhelm the Yokai with the special symbol!

If things are going to get out of hand, you also have another special move available to wipe out all enemies in sight,; be careful though, you can only use it a limited number of times

EIGHT UNIQUE ENEMIES

In the game there are eight types of enemies: each of them is a different threat to the player, learn their behavior to deal with the various waves more effectively, choosing in what order to get rid of them!

INTENSITY

The better you are, the more difficult the game becomes, but also the points obtained will be more. Maintain the flow and demonstrate your skills.

A LOT OF DIFFERENT WAVES

Enemies do not appear randomly, but are part of pre-established waves. Which waves you will face, however, will be decided by fate. Learn to recognize patterns to be prepared for threats! Some waves will only appear at higher intensities.

ENDLESS GAME AND SCORE SYSTEM

Hold on as long as you can and beat the highscore! Take advantage of combos and kill enemies when they are closest to the grid for bonus points.

INK

Defeat the Yokai before they get too close to you or dodge them to avoid losing great quantities of ink and decreasing your maximum capacity of it. Be careful though, the enemies who reach your ink supply will take away a minor quantity of it. You need ink to trace the symbols; avoid running out of ink by killing enemy to refill it. If you run out of ink, you lose the game.

POWER UPS

Power ups will occasionally appear on the grid which will allow you to have temporary bonuses. Try to catch them without getting hit by incoming enemies and evaluate the best time to do it.
